documentation.author: b107820
documentation.purpose: Add C Urine to patients < 1 at SFB when Leuk Est is a verified

statements.statement: SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.DESCRIPTION ,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
/* SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 1901 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_STATUS
templateDefinitions.definition: a RESULT_STATUS result exists for PROCEDURE

statements.statement: SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.CODE_VALUE ,C1.DISPLAY ,C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 and cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) between c1.begin_effective_dt_tm and c1.end_effective_dt_tm ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_LOCATION
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's LTYPE location is LOCATION
templateDefinitions.description: The patient's specified location type and location

statements.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT
C1.cdf_meaning
FROM CODE_VALUE C1
WHERE C1.CODE_SET= 220 AND c1.cdf_meaning IN("FACILITY","BUILDING","NURSEUNIT","ROOM","BED","AMBULATORY")
order C1.cdf_meaning

SELECT DISTINCT C1.DISPLAY_KEY, c1.cdf_meaning, DESC=CNVTUPPER(C1.DESCRIPTION), /* C1.CODE_VALUE, */ C1.CODE_SET, C2.DISPLAY
FROM CODE_VALUE C1, CODE_VALUE_SET C2
PLAN C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET= 220 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND= 1 and c1.cdf_meaning IN("FACILITY","BUILDING","NURSEUNIT","ROOM","BED","AMBULATORY") JOIN C2 WHERE C2.CODE_SET=c1.code_set
order C1.cdf_meaning, c1.display_KEY, DESC

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_PARAM_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a dynamic parameter named PARAMNAME with a value of PARAMVALUE. And OPT_SUBSTITUTION resolve substitution value.
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a dynamic parameter to be used by subsequent templates.

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))
select param_value ="Double click in lower box to enter a freetext value, or right click and paste values that have been copied", _hidden = " " from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_DT_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_ANCHOR_DT or inherit it from OPT_LINK, offset OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes for orders setup in group(s) GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_CREATE
templateDefinitions.definition: Create RESULT_STATUS result RESULT for procedure PROCEDURE1 with CHART result comment COMMENT linked to PROCEDURE2

statements.statement: select t.mnemonic, t.task_assay_cd from discrete_task_assay t where t.active_ind = 1 order t.mnemonic /* select o.order_mnemonic, c.description from orders o, order_catalog c where o.catalog_cd = c.catalog_cd */

value.value: select c.drawn_dt_tm from container c, order_container_r o plan o where o.order_id = trigger_orderid join c where c.container_id = o.container_id detail log_misc1 = format(c.drawn_dt_tm, ";;q"),log_message = concat("Coll date/time set to ",log_misc1) go

select c.drawn_id from container c, order_container_r o plan o where o.order_id = trigger_orderid join c where c.container_id = o.container_id detail log_misc1 = CNVTSTRING(c.drawn_id), log_message = concat("drawn id set to",log_misc1) go
